snippet: The company said it expected lower earnings because oil production fell and the price of oil declined.
abstract: Chevron warns that its third-quarter earnings are expected to be 'substantially lower' than in the second quarter because oil production fell and the price of oil declined.
lead_paragraph: The company said it expected lower earnings because oil production fell and the price of oil declined.

headline.main: Chevron Cuts Its Forecast for 3rd-Quarter Earnings
headline.print_headline: Chevron Cuts Its Forecast For 3rd-Quarter Earnings
